thread.title: Bruce: Staying dry and hot for now
thread.title_full: Bruce: Staying dry and hot for now - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Staying dry and hot for now
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - With lots of sunshine today and an upper ridge, the high at the airport climbed to 89Â°! We could see much of the same through Friday.
By Friday a breakdown of the ridge may keep temps a few degrees cooler, then a weak cold front for the weekend will drop afternoon highs into the low 80s with overnight lows in the 50s and 60s by Sunday and Monday. It will be cooler at night with less humidity. No real Fall-like temps through the next 10 days.
Follow me on Twitter: @BruceKatzFOX8
- Meteorologist Bruce Katz
